description: Similar to the classic Rock Rings, but made with wood for more skin-friendly training. Hang them anywhere to work on your pull-ups, lock-offs or dead hangs. Each Wood Rock Ring includes a jug on top, a large edge, and a small edge.Made of fine-grain wood that doesn't shred your skin.Designed to allow rotation of joints to prevent injury.3 different sized edges work for all ability levels.4 screws included for mounting.
name: Metolius Wood Rock Rings
